bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLVII. Addenda. Published by Tiziano DORANDI and Pierre GASNAULT.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XLVII, 1403-1468. -Addenda to: Part III. British Museum, London. No. 1403; - Part IV. Great Britain (without British Museum London), Nos 1404-1436; - Part V. Italy VIII. Nos 1463-1464; - Part XLVI. Nos 1465-1468.
bibl.seg: BRUCKNER Albert † and Robert MARICHAL, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLVII. Addenda. Published by Tiziano DORANDI and Pierre GASNAULT.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1997, in fol., vii-132 pp., ill. ISBN 3-85951-185-8.
